name: FVRKFACE
description:
Have you ever eaten a pencil? Have you ever wielded a tiny, impractical baseball bat? Have you ever completed a bunch of meaningless, deeply referential puzzles for little to no reward? Then FVRKFACE is the VR experience you've been waiting for! Get ready for heart-pumping, tortion-inducing, explosive action! Complete the challenges to receive your well-earned F**kFace certified baseball bat!

...so uh, real talk for a second:

This Virtual Reality experience is created for the HTC Vive.
It features teleportation locomotion and a few very simple puzzles to be solved to win the coveted F**kFace Bat. There are no adjustable settings or in-game menu. If you experience any errors or bugs, post a comment and I'll try my best to post an update to resolve the issue. 

I don't have access to the Oculus or Index platforms, so let me know if the game works for either, and I'll see what I can do about compatibility. Otherwise, enjoy!

Disclaimer: I am not associated with RoosterTeeth, F**kface. All likenesses, podcast excerpts, images and related material are properties of WarnerMedia.
